documentType: administrative detention order and inmate records
summary: This document set consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms related to the placement of inmate 86993-054 (Jeffrey Epstein) into Administrative Detention/Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on July 16, 2019. The forms detail the reason for placement (pending SIS investigation/threat assessment), periodic reviews, and a psychological evaluation indicating he was stable. The records show his continued detention in SHU through at least August 6, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed in Administrative Detention/Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the New York MCC on July 16, 2019, for his own protection pending a Special Investigative Services (SIS) investigation and threat assessment.
The documented reason for SHU placement includes: 'PENDING SIS INVESTIGATION/ THREAT ASSESSMENT' and a note stating 'COURTS SAY INMATE FELT THREATENED ON UNIT.'
A psychological review on July 18, 2019, conducted by Chief Psychologist Elissa Miller, found Epstein psychologically stable, with low threat to self/others, and adequately adjusting to SHU.
Periodic administrative reviews on July 19, July 23, and August 6, 2019, all resulted in decisions to continue his detention in the Special Housing Unit.

Epstein's inmate profile lists his register number as 86993-054, date of birth as March 10, 1969, and that he was in custody at the New York MCC since August 1, 2018, on charges related to 21 USC 841 and 846 (drug offenses).
